thread.section_title: Wine Cellarage Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Wine Cellarage | winecellarage.com
thread.title: Mark

author: Mark
title: Mark
text:
Having spent more than my faire share of time on the phone with an endless myriad of wine representatives, what a unique & pleasurable experience it was for me to have the privilege to speak with "Marcy" on the phone!!!
Not only was Marcy extremely knowledgeable in regards to my endless inquiries, but also provided me with her personal insights into small boutique Champagne producers & then to place the cherry on top of the proverbial cake....suggested a most beneficial way for my wines to be stored free of charge for an extended period of time to avoid shipping from the East coast to the West coast where I live to avoid the wines/champagne being shipped during the hottest months of the year.
With customer satisfaction being seemingly a rare commodity these days...what a "Pleasant Surprise" to have finding Marcy on the other end of the phone!
My appreciation goes to Wine Cellarage for finding & employing Marcy...a RARE VINTAGE she truly is!....Mark.A
